title: The Banking Information  Domain Schema
description: Contains everything related to banking information of an entity

BankingInformationSummariesList.title: List of banking information summaries
BankingInformationSummariesList.description: List of summaries of different banking products and bills of the entity

BankingInformationType.title: Type (enum)
BankingInformationType.description: Specifies the type of banking info according to an enum

TrBankingInformationType.title: Type (translatable)
TrBankingInformationType.description: Specifies the type of banking info

HelpText.title: Help Text
HelpText.description: Short generic explanation about the meaning of the summary

SummariesList.title: List of summaries
SummariesList.description: List of summaries related to a specific type of banking information

SummaryMode.title: Summary mode
SummaryMode.description: Distinguish if the content includes evolution data (Multiple) or a single-shot photo (Single)

SummaryType.title: Summary Type (enum)
SummaryType.description: Type of aggregation used in the current summary, under an enum

TrSummaryType.title: Summary Type (translatable)
TrSummaryType.description: Type of aggregation used in the current summary, under an enum

RecordsList.title: List of Records
RecordsList.description: Each element of the list of records of the summary, including all of their values

HelpText.title: Help Text
HelpText.description: Short generic explanation about the meaning of the record

RecordDate.title: Record date
RecordDate.description: Date of the event described. Used specially in multiple-mode

Datatype.title: Other data's datatype
Datatype.description: Schema datatype for the data used

Tag.title: Other data's tag
Tag.description: Tag that describes the data used

OtherDataList.title: List of Other Data
OtherDataList.description: Any other data relative to this publication

SourceInfo.title: Source Info
SourceInfo.description: Set of values to locate the info in the original source

Source.title: Data source
Source.description: Indicates the source of collected banking information
examples: Memoria 2017 de AXESOR CONOCER PARA DECIDIR

ReferenceId.title: Source Reference Id
ReferenceId.description: External id used to reference an specific data in the document where it was published

PublicationId.title: Source Publication Id
PublicationId.description: External id used to reference the document where the data where published

PageNumber.title: Source page
PageNumber.description: Page number where the specific data was published

BankingInformationDetailsList.title: List of banking information summaries
BankingInformationDetailsList.description: List of summaries of different banking products and bills of the entity

BankingInformationType.description: Specifies the type of banking info according to an enum

TrBankingInformationType.description: Specifies the type of banking info

HelpText.title: Help Text
HelpText.description: Short generic explanation about the meaning of the summary

OverallElementsList.title: List of details
OverallElementsList.description: Full list of the financial elements added up from all the financial entities

ElementTitle.title: Element title
ElementTitle.description: Name of the current financial element or line

ElementCode.title: Element code
ElementCode.description: Code (usually numeric) used to referr a financial element according to official regulations

ElementGroup.title: Element group
ElementGroup.description: Used to indicate an agroupation or parent class for this element

ElementHelp.title: Element help
ElementHelp.description: Short generic explanation about the content of the element

ElementDetail.title: Element detail
ElementDetail.description: Any other detail about the element

Indentation.title: Indentation level
Indentation.descripcion: Indentation of the title of element (left to right)

Order.title: Order level
Order.descripcion: Position of the element in the section (up to down)

VendorElementId.title: Vendor Element Id
VendorElementId.description: Id that points the specific element to vendor's coding

ElementValues.title: Element's values
ElementValues.description: Set of values of the element, including its single value and variation over previous periods

Period.title: Period identifier
Period.description: Indicates a date to distinguish every periodical statement

Value.title: Value
Value.description: Contains the single value filed by the entity for an element in the current period

Variation.title: Variation
Variation.description: Contains the variation between values, to track the performance of the element over different periods

OtherDataList.description: Any other data relative to this publication

AccountNumber.description: Number of account with the entity

IBAN.description: IBAN code of the account with the entity

Source.description: Indicates the source of collected banking information with that entity
